moves.name: Ice Beam
moves.effect: Has a chance (10%) of leaving the target frozen.

moves.name: X Accuracy
moves.effect: Raises the user’s accuracy by 2 stat ranks.

moves.name: On My Mark!
moves.effect: Raises the user’s Defense, Sp. Def, and critical-hit rate by 1 stat rank.

moves.name: Blizzard
moves.effect: Never misses during a hailstorm. Has a chance (10%) of leaving the target frozen.

passives.name: Snow Shelter
passives.description: Protects the user from damage from a hailstorm.

passives.name: Power Reserves 2
passives.description: Powers up the user’s moves when in a pinch.

passives.name: Superduper Effective 1
passives.description: Powers up moves that are super effective.
